keyword: how many calories in michelob ultra
title: How Many Calories in Michelob Ultra?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in Michelob Ultra per 12 oz serving, plus carbs, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for light beer nutrition.
h1: How Many Calories in Michelob Ultra?
assumptions: Standard 12 oz (355 ml) bottle or can of Michelob Ultra light lager beer, as served chilled.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand batch, serving size, and any added flavors; check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz Michelob Ultra has 95 kcal and just 2.6 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Michelob Ultra?
What are the carbs in Michelob Ultra?
faqs.a: Only 2.6 g carbs per serving, making it low-carb.

faqs.q: Does Michelob Ultra have protein or fat?
faqs.a: 0.6 g protein and 0 g fat per 12 oz.

faqs.q: How does Michelob Ultra compare to other light beers?
faqs.a: It's among the lowest at 95 kcal, lower than many like Bud Light (110 kcal).

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Michelob Ultra?
faqs.a: Very low at 5 mg per bottle.
